briefTitle: DS-5565 Phase III Study for Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
officialTitle: An Asian, Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled 14-Week Study of DS-5565 in Patients With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain Followed by a 52-Week Open-label Extension
summary: Investigate the efficacy and safety of DS-5565 in subjects with Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain (DPNP) in comparison to placebo

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in the Average Daily Pain Score (ADPS) From Baseline to Week 14 Following Administration of DS-5565 in Participants With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to Week 14 (post-dose 1 [15 mg QD] and post-dose 2 [20 mg and 30 mg])
